tool_description: An API that will return a random emoji from /emojis
name: EmojiAPI
title: EmojiAPI

api_list.name: Random Emoji
api_list.description: Returns a random emoji from the /emojis endpoint
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://emojiapi1.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "emojiapi1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: emojis
api_list.description: Returns all the emojis that can be picked from
api_list.code:

headers = {
